channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7

item.title: CVE-2024-3049|2024-06-06T05:30:04.137Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20enterprise%20linux%207
item.description: A flaw was found in Booth, a cluster ticket manager. If a specially-crafted hash is passed to gcry_md_get_algo_dlen(), it may allow an invalid HMAC to be accepted by the Booth server.
